channel.title: conf on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in conf on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: PyCon 2010 CFP: Five Days Left
item.description: The CFP for PyCon 2010 closes in five days.

item.title: OSCON 2008
item.description: I’m in Portland, Oregon this week for OSCON 2008 .

item.title: OpenWeb 2008 Slides
item.description: As promised, slides for my OpenWeb talk, Deploying the Semantic Web with ccREL and RDFa, are available .

item.title: Heading to PyCon
item.description: I’ve spent the first part of this week in San Francisco for some face time with the rest of the Creative Commons staff and participating in what I believe are our first all-staff meetings [1]2{#id1.

item.title: Toronto Bound
item.description: So it looks like I’m going to be presenting at the Seneca Free Software and Open Source Symposium later this month.

item.title: PyCon 2006 CFP Out
item.description: This year PyCon is moving from our home at George Washington University’s Cafritz Center to sunny (I assume) Dallas.
